description.desc_1: Automatic calorie calculation and a personalized meal plan
description.desc_2: for weight loss, maintenance, or gain

description_mobile.descm_1: Online BMI and macronutrient calculator: calculate your body mass index, daily intake of calories, proteins, fats, carbs, and water.
description_mobile.descm_2: Discover the composition of foods, monitor your nutrition, and choose effective exercises for health, weight loss, and fitness maintenance.

calculation.extra_active: Extra active (very hard exercise/sports & physical job, or training twice a day)
calculation.notation: The data is used only for calculations, is not stored without your consent, and is not shared with third parties

result.title: Calculation Results
result.description: The calculation is based on the data you provided and generally accepted formulas. You can change the parameters at any time

error.general: An error occurred while fetching data.

nutrition.title: Nutrition
nutrition.description: A table of foods with calories, proteins, fats, and carbs (CPCF) helps plan your diet and monitor your nutrition

workout.title: Workout
workout.description: A catalog of exercises for all fitness levels: workouts for weight loss, muscle gain, and maintaining fitness. Choose effective exercises for home and gym.

menu.menu_notation: The meal plan is for informational purposes only and is intended for a healthy adult. If you have medical conditions or restrictions, consultation with a specialist is recommended. All values and calculations are approximate.
menu.save_menu_title: To save the meal plan, sign in or create an account
menu.save_menu_descr: Registration will give you access to saving, history, and editing meal plans.

contact.title: Contacts
contact.description: Write to us if you have any questions about the BodyFlow service, calorie and macro calculations, or the website functionality. We carefully review all inquiries.

home.title: Calorie & Macro Calculator with a 5-Day Meal Plan — Online Calculation
home.description: Automatic calculation of calories, macros, BMI, and daily water intake. A ready-made 5-day meal plan for weight loss, maintenance, or gain.
home.keywords: 5-day meal plan, macro-based meal plan, online meal plan, ready-made meal plan, calorie calculator online, personalized nutrition plan, online nutrition plan, weight loss meal plan, daily calorie intake, macro targets, macro balance, macro-based nutrition plan, body mass index calculation

nutrition.title: Food Composition & Nutrition Table — Calories, Proteins, Fats, Carbs
nutrition.description: Discover the composition and caloric value of foods: a nutrition table with proteins, fats, carbohydrates, and calories. Find healthy foods for weight loss, muscle gain, and balanced nutrition.
nutrition.keywords: food composition, calorie table, product macros, food calorie content, proteins fats carbs, foods for weight loss, foods for muscle gain, healthy eating

product.description: {name} detailed composition: calories, proteins, fats, carbohydrates, water, minerals, and vitamins. Explore the nutrient profile for balanced nutrition and better health.
product.keywords: product calories, macros, food composition, nutrients, proteins fats carbs, vitamins, minerals, water in foods, calories per 100g, healthy nutrition

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy (the "Policy") describes how BodyFlow ("We", "Our Company", "Website") collects, uses, protects, and discloses users’ personal data ("User", "You") when you use our website https://bodyflow.com.ua. We take the confidentiality of your data seriously and are committed to protecting your information.
privacy.s1_1_text: We may collect the following personal data when you use our online platform:
privacy.s1_1_li1: Identification information (first name, last name, address, phone number, email address).
privacy.s1_1_li2: Payment information (e.g., payment details, credit card numbers).
privacy.s1_1_li3: Technical information (IP address, browser type, access time, page URLs, cookies).
privacy.s1_1_li4: Information about your activity on the platform (orders, reviews, on-site behavior).
privacy.s1_2_li1: Registration and completing forms on our online platform.
privacy.s1_2_li2: Using our services, such as purchasing goods, participating in promotions, and leaving reviews.
privacy.s1_2_li3: Using our mobile applications and other ways of interacting with our services.
privacy.s2_1_title: We use your personal data for the following purposes:
privacy.s2_1_li1: To fulfill agreements with you (order processing, delivery of goods, compensation payments).
privacy.s2_1_li2: To improve our services (user activity analysis, enhancing website functionality).
privacy.s2_1_li3: To communicate with you (order status updates, important changes on the platform).
privacy.s2_1_li4: To personalize user experience (recommendations, special offers).
privacy.s2_2_text: We do not use your data for other purposes without your explicit consent.
privacy.s3_1_text: We take all necessary technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of your personal data. In particular, we use secure connections (SSL), encryption systems, and password-protected access to maintain confidentiality of your information.
privacy.s3_2_text: Your personal data is stored only for as long as necessary to fulfill our obligations to you or to comply with legal requirements.
privacy.s4_1_text: We do not sell, transfer, or disclose your personal data to third parties, except in cases described in this Privacy Policy.
privacy.s4_2_title: We may share your personal data with:
privacy.s4_2_li1: Our partners and service providers who help us fulfill orders or provide services (e.g., delivery companies, payment systems).
privacy.s4_2_li2: When required by law, court orders, or government authorities.
privacy.s5_1_text: Our website uses cookies to improve your experience on the online platform, analyze traffic, and tailor content to your interests.
privacy.s5_2_text: You can configure your browser to refuse cookies; however, this may limit certain features of the website.
privacy.s6_1_text: You have the right to request information about what personal data we store and to request correction or deletion of that data.
privacy.s6_2_text: You may withdraw your consent to the processing of personal data at any time by sending a notice to our email address
privacy.s7_1_text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
privacy.s7_2_text: All changes take effect when they are published on our website. We recommend reviewing this Policy periodically.
privacy.s8_text: If you have any questions or requests regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us using the following details:
